Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Blessing III</size></color>
Desc: Machiavelli summons 2 <color=#34aff9>Iron Thorns</color> every after losing 25% HP. The Iron Thorns will explode and destroy the platform in 35s.

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Solitude</size></color>
Desc: When an enemy has fewer than 3 companions around, for each companion lost, Extra DMG Bonus increases by 10%, up to 30%.

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Commander I</size></color>
Desc: For each companion around, enemies' Extra DMG Bonus increases by 5%. Can be stacked up to 3 times.

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Commander II</size></color>
Desc: For each companion around, enemies' Extra DMG Bonus increases by 10%. Can be stacked up to 3 times.

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Commander III</size></color>
Desc: For each companion around, enemies' Extra DMG Bonus increases by 15%. Can be stacked up to 3 times.

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Penetration</size></color>
Desc: Each hit of the enemies reduces your team's DEF by 3% for 10s. Stacks up to 10 times.

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Lightning Shield</size></color>
Desc: Every time an enemy takes DMG, they have a 10% chance to call down a lightning strike upon the attacker. Cooldown: 5s.

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Wave I</size></color>
Desc: When an enemy gets up after being knocked down, they will create a shock wave to knock away nearby units. Cooldown: 18s.

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Wave II</size></color>
Desc: When an enemy gets up after being knocked down, they will create a shock wave to knock away nearby units. Cooldown: 14s.

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Wave III</size></color>
Desc: When an enemy gets up after being knocked down, they will create a shock wave to knock away nearby units. Cooldown: 10s.

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Lightning Mine</size></color>
Desc: When attacking, enemies will attach a bomb to the target, which will explode after a period of time and deal 15% Physical DMG.

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Stealth</size></color>
Desc: Enemies enter Stealth. Reveal themselves after taking DMG and can't enter Stealth again within 3s.

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Mechanism Target</size></color>
Desc: <color=#CF0000>Avoid the Red Orbs and break the crystal.</color>

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Red Crystal</size></color>
Desc: Break it to turn some of the Red Orbs into Blue Orbs.

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Red Orb</size></color>
Desc: Red Orbs near the character will explode. Try to avoid them.

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Blue Orb</size></color>
Desc: When red orbs are converted into blue orbs, they will attack the nearest enemy.

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Soundwave Fever Value</size></color>
Desc: Break all crystals or touch all the Red Orbs to end. The final FEVER will be calculated based on the number of Blue Orbs converted.

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Mechanism Target</size></color>
Desc: <color=#CF0000>Spread up the red tiles. Break the crystal to turn them blue.</color>

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Red Crystal</size></color>
Desc: Break the crystal and all red tiles will be turned into blue tiles.

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Spotlight</size></color>
Desc: After the character enters mechanism, the spotlight will light up where the character stands in the order of white, green, yellow, and red. When the spotlight is red, it will turn the corresponding tile into red.

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Red Tile</size></color>
Desc: The red tiles will explode when the spotlight shines on them, so watch your step!

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Blue Tile</size></color>
Desc: Converted from a Red Tile.

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Spotlight Fever Value</size></color>
Desc: Break all crystals to end. The final FEVER will be calculated based on the number of blue tiles converted.

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Mechanism Target</size></color>
Desc: <color=#CF0000>Aim at the crystal and attack to defeat the fairies on the line.</color>

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Aim at the crystals.</size></color>
Desc: Direction marks will show up when you're close to the area. Break the crystals to fire Impact Orbs to defeat the fairies in lines.

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Fairy</size></color>
Desc: Can only be broken by Impact Orbs.

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Collision Fever Value</size></color>
Desc: Break all crystals or defeat all fairies to end. The final FEVER will be calculated based on the number of fairies defeated.

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Mechanism Target</size></color>
Desc: <color=#CF0000>Increase the number of red tiles, break the crystals, and converts as many as tiles and red orbs while avoiding the red orbs.</color>

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Fever Value</size></color>
Desc: The final FEVER Value will be calculated based on the number of the Blue Orbs and the blue tiles.

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Mechanism Target</size></color>
Desc: Convert as many red tiles as possible while aiming to defeat the fairies in lines.

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Fever Value</size></color>
Desc: The final FEVER Value will be calculated based on the number of the blue tiles and Fairies defeated.

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Mechanism Target</size></color>
Desc: <color=#CF0000>Defeat as many fairies as possible while avoiding the Red Orbs.</color>

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Fever Value</size></color>
Desc: The final FEVER Value will be calculated based on the Blue Orbs and Fairies defeated.

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Co-op Mechanism</size></color>
Desc: A boss will shuttle between team members every 30s. Members not facing the boss will have to deal with the mechanics. Maintain the Fever status to defeat the boss!
TeachingContents[1]: Text: Use talents and stage clearing mechanisms to support your teammates. Your Fever value will be calculated after clearing a mechanic. Once the entire team reaches 100 Fever, the team will enter a Fever state and gain a massive bonus!

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Soundwave Evasion</size></color>
Desc: Avoid the Red Orbs and break the crystal.

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Battlefield Spotlight</size></color>
Desc: Spread up the red tiles. Break the crystal to turn them blue.

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Crystal Collision</size></color>
Desc: Aim at the crystal and attack to defeat the fairies on the line.

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Mechanism Target</size></color>
Desc: <color=#CF0000>Pick up all the Signal Orbs asap.</color>

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Signal Orb</size></color>
Desc: Pick it up to trigger Talent 2 and inflict buff(s) to the character and their teammates.

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Mechanism Target</size></color>
Desc: <color=#CF0000>Reach the destination and learn about how the wall works.</color>

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Blue Wall</size></color>
Desc: These walls will rise when you walk by. They will turn yellow and go down after forming a closed pattern.

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Red Wall</size></color>
Desc: Can be used to form closed patterns.

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Mechanism Target</size></color>
Desc: <color=#CF0000>Pick up all the Signal Orbs.</color>

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Mechanism Target</size></color>
Desc: <color=#CF0000>Defeat the enemy and pick up all the small orbs.</color>

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Small Orb</size></color>
Desc: Defeat all the enemies on the battlefield. Pick up Orbs of the same color for 2 points. Pick up Orbs of a different color for 1 point.

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Mechanism Target</size></color>
Desc: <color=#CF0000>Avoid the Red Orbs and defeat the enemy.</color>

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Raging Player</size></color>
Desc: Appears on the edges of the field and keeps firing Red Orbs at your team. Dashes to your team at intervals. Break it to gain FEVER points.

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Calm Player</size></color>
Desc: Converts after defeating the raging players

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Mechanism Target</size></color>
Desc: <color=#CF0000>Defeat the enemy and light up the Star Lantern.</color>

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Star Lantern</size></color>
Desc: Stand in it for 5s to light it up. The Star Lantern will exist for 15s.

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Light up the Star Lantern.</size></color>
Desc: Fight under the Star Lantern that has been lit up and obtain various buffs based on its color.
TeachingContents[1]: text: Based on the class when the lantern is lit up, the lantern will turn red, yellow, or blue.
TeachingContents[4]: text: [Green]: Restores 10% of Max HP every second.

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Surrealist Mechanical Fauvism</size></color>
Desc: Masters of this school tend to be more aggressive, and their attacks will trigger paint burst of the floor.
TeachingContents[1]: text: 1. When there is Super Armor, the enemy gains 80% DMG Reduction.
TeachingContents[2]: text: 2. Entering the Matrix successfully will reduce the enemy's Super Armor by 50%.
TeachingContents[3]: text: 3. Receives more DMG when there is no Super Armor.

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Fauvism Paint Burst</size></color>
Desc: The enemy will summon paint by successfully hitting the target with an attack.

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Fantastical Mechanical Impressionism</size></color>
Desc: Masters of this school tend to be more flexible.
TeachingContents[1]: text: 1. When there is Super Armor, the enemy gains 80% DMG Reduction.
TeachingContents[2]: text: 2. Entering the Matrix or performing an Extreme Dodge successfully will reduce the enemy's Super Armor by 20%.

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Multidimensional Mechanical Cubism</size></color>
Desc: Masters of this school are good at painting geometric shapes to attack the opponent.
TeachingContents[1]: text: 1. When there is Super Armor, the enemy gains 80% DMG Reduction.
TeachingContents[2]: text: 2. Entering the Matrix successfully will reduce the enemy's Super Armor by 20%.
TeachingContents[3]: text: 3. Avoiding the Multidimensional Matrix successfully will reduce the enemy's Super Armor by 60%.

Name: <color=#34aff9><size=34>Multidimensional Matrix</size></color>
Desc: Cast at intervals. Avoid according to the arrows and the warning signs.
TeachingContents[1]: text: 1. Successfully avoid the Matrix to reduce the Cubist's Super Armor by 60%.
